scripts.force-refresh: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome" to reload active tab of window 1'
scripts.prerender-html: node src/server/esbuild.js && node src/server/ssg.js && yarn rimraf src/server/ssg.js
scripts.start: yarn rimraf dist && yarn prerender-html && yarn prerender-css && yarn nodemon --watch src --exec 'yarn prerender-js-dev && yarn force-refresh' --ext ts,tsx
scripts.build: yarn rimraf dist && yarn prerender-html && yarn prerender-css && yarn prerender-js-prod
